title: Drawing, "Four Studies of Works by Perugino and Francia", 1811–14
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over black chalk on cream wove paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown ink bottom left: "103" and at top, right of center: "167"
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Madonna with Infant and St. Rocco, Benedict, Sebastian, Anthony. After Francesco Francia.  Apostles by Lorenzo Costa. Verso: balustrade with papal insignia; death of a brother.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Four Studies of Works by Perugino and Francia", 1811–14.
1811–14. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over black chalk on cream wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2738.
